document.full_text: it has been called a lot of things over the years: grass, pot, mary jane, wacky weed. now, researchers are suggesting a new moniker for marijuana: alternative investment.
document.title: marijuana called pot, grass, weed -- now investment
lines_and_colors: it has been called a lot of things over the years: grass, pot, mary jane, wacky weed. now, researchers are suggesting a new moniker for marijuana: alternative investment.
